name: Magic Gondola''s adventure
description:
Poor Gondola is dying of cancer, he has only 2 years left to live.
Help him  with his favorite Hobby, Fishing.
His goal is to catch 2 mln fishes before he goes away.

 Drag Lmb  to launch Hook, press and hold to get it back
1 fish per 1 launch
Rmb to restart hook to  starting possition
